p: Following the initial outbreak in New York in 1999 [ 37], surveillance of mosquitoes and birds showed WNV spread along the eastern seaboard reaching Florida by 2001 [ 4] and west to the Rocky Mountains and Pacific Northwest (Washington state) by 2002 [ 4, 49]. Finally, in 2003, WNV was detected in Southern California [ 4, 50], marking its successful establishment across the continental US.
